definition: to fall in love with/to be in love with
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: I'm one hundred percent sure he's falling in love with you.
sentences.chinese: 我百分之百肯定他愛上了你。

sentences.english: Within two weeks he had fallen for a local girl called Faniry, or "Desire" in Malagasy. You could not blame him.
sentences.chinese: 不出兩週，他就愛上了一位當地一個叫法利瑞的女孩。

sentences.english: The hero of the story is in love with a woman who--alas and alack--does not love him.
sentences.chinese: 主角愛上了一位女子，可是那女子並不愛他。

sentences.english: I entered the lobby, and loved the ambience immediately.
sentences.chinese: 一進到大廳，我馬上愛上了那裏的氣氛。

sentences.english: When you started to make me fall in love with that boy, you mixed up my life.
sentences.chinese: 打從你開讓我愛上那個男孩，就把我的生活都打亂了。

sentences.english: Yes, sir, it was love from the word go.
sentences.chinese: 是的，先生，我們從一開始就愛上對方了。

sentences.english: But, when the hunter falls in love with prey, his inexorable doom often starts accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，當獵人愛上獵物的時候，他的劫數常因此肇始。

sentences.english: The third reason to love someone is despite who they are.
sentences.chinese: 愛上某人的第三個原因是不管他們是怎樣的人。

sentences.english: He was sitting in front of me and I fell in love with the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 他就坐在我的前面，我一下子愛上了他脖子的背影。

sentences.english: Once you love who you are, you will be totally free to love others.
sentences.chinese: 一旦愛上自己，你將能毫無芥蒂地愛上別人。

sentences.english: She recently falls in love for Orange juice and Mango Juice….
sentences.chinese: 最近她愛上了兩種果汁，橙汁和芒果汁。

sentences.english: No man loves his fetters be they made of gold.
sentences.chinese: 即使腳鐐黃金鑄，無人愛上這刑具。

sentences.english: Learn to Iove whatever work you're doing.
If Jack's in love, he's no judge of Jill's beauty.
sentences.chinese: 如果傑克愛上了吉爾，吉爾再醜他也說俏麗。

sentences.english: Flight LiuChangLing fell in love with QingBaoChu mid-team leader of the MaXin blue captain.
sentences.chinese: 飛行中隊長劉長嶺愛上了情報處的馬昕藍上尉。

sentences.english: Also a homegrown musical "Love U, Teresa" has returned to Beijing's Poly Theater.
sentences.chinese: 本土音樂劇《愛上鄧麗君》也回到北京的保利劇院。

definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to be infatuated with/to be enchanted by/to be passionate about
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to know/to recognize/to be familiar with/to get acquainted with sb/knowledge/understanding/awareness/cognition
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to press charges/to file a complaint
